title: Time is gold
author: Time is gold
content: What kind of project is Crypto Finance?I don't really know Let me know.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Basically all crypto projects are financial based even bitcoin which is companyless. As they are used to addressing many customer needs, they expanded the service and started creating certain contracts (of course with new coins to make it easier to control), adapted to more specific business models and functions such as instant payments, trading, defi loans, etc.
